message: Oval Tower rises above us, gleaming brilliantly at the center of this unending night.
We stand before the entrance to the tower, taking in its splendor.
Guards are stationed at the entryway.

name: 警備Ａ
message: "Please show your invitation to the authentication screen."
I open the invitation on my Coil and hold it up to the screen by the entrance.

name: 認証モニター
message: "...Confirmed. Welcome to Oval Tower. Please proceed."
This is it. From this point forward, we're firmly in Toue's grasp.
Clear and I exchange a look... then step inside.
